data.actual_result: The category still appears after you've muted the channels; Interacting with the category makes it hidden
data.expected_result: The category should be hidden along with the channels you've muted
data.short_description: Muting multiple channels within a category then collapsing the category and hiding muted channels will still show the collapsed category on the channel list until you interact with it
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute multiple chanels within a category - Collapse the category - Select "Hide Muted Channels" in the server settings (this setting needs to be set to the "Show Muted Channels" first in order for the bug to work) - Observe - Uncollapse the category
